effect.text: Choose 1 of your own Pokémon in play and return its Basic Pokémon card to your hand. (Discard all cards attached to that card.)

tips: Use primarily to save Pokemon that are about to be knocked out
Time right before a Pokemon would be knocked out to maximize value
Use Energy Retrieval immediately after to recover discarded Energy
Scoop Up can remove Special Conditions
Combine with Alakazam's Damage Swap to concentrate damage before scooping

rulings.ruling: You return only the Basic Pokemon card to your hand; all Evolution cards are discarded
All Energy cards attached to the Pokemon are discarded
All other cards attached to the Pokemon (Defender, PlusPower, etc.) are discarded
All damage counters on the Pokemon are removed (the Pokemon is healed when returned to hand)
All Special Conditions on the Pokemon are removed
The Pokemon is no longer in play and does not count toward your in-play Pokemon count
You cannot use Scoop Up if it would leave you with zero Pokemon in play
You can immediately replay the Basic Pokemon in the same turn if you want
If the Pokemon is evolved, only the Basic card is returned; Stage 1 and Stage 2 go to discard
You can use Scoop Up on a Pokemon that was just played this turn
Any effects or attacks targeting the Pokemon are removed when it leaves play
